text:
Tomorrow's schedule is set. We'll enter the venue at
10 a.m, and the recording is scheduled to start at 2 p.m.

The building itself is quite large, so there's quite a
bit of moving around inside, as the staff mentioned.

I want to make sure once again that I don't
make the same mistakes I did before.
We enter at 10 a.m., and recording starts at 2 p.m.!

Alright!
Let's give it our all tomorrow too, Producer!
